features: Our FlexVent™ suspension system features a flexible yoke built from custom injection-molded shoulder straps; an unbelievably comfortable, padded back panel; and a highly breathable lumbar panel for maximum breathability, all certified by the American Chiropractic Association
Two webbing top handles allow for both a modern interaction with the pack while you’re holding it as well as a perfectly balanced carry when the pack is by your side
Pack stands on its own for easy loading and unloading of essentials
Padded laptop sleeve protects laptop from bumps and falls
Huge main compartment holds all the books and binders needed for a day on campus
Updated front compartment simplifies organization for the modern user while maintaining essential features for storage such as secure-zip pockets, a tablet sleeve and a key fob
External stash pocket can fit quick-access items such as a jacket
360-degree reflectivity enhances visibility while you're commuting
HB0, JK3, N4L, S9W, T89, TPT: 600D 50% recycled polyester with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
5YG, EM7, T86, TM8: 300D heathered polyester with non-PFC DWR finish
Dimensions: 11" x 8.5" x 18" (27.9 cm x 21.6 cm x 45.7 cm)
Laptop Sleeve: 11.5" x 11" (29.2 cm x 27.9 cm)
